sections.heading: any section or provision of the Nebraska Racetrack Gaming Act is determined by a court of competent jurisdiction to be unconstitutional or otherwise void or invalid for any reason, such determination shall not affect the validity of the Nebraska Racetrack Gaming Act as a whole or any part thereof, o
sections.text: any section or provision of the Nebraska Racetrack Gaming Act is determined by a court of competent jurisdiction to be unconstitutional or otherwise void or invalid for any reason, such determination shall not affect the validity of the Nebraska Racetrack Gaming Act as a whole or any part thereof, other than the part so determined to be unconstitutional or otherwise void or invalid.SourceInitiative Law 2020, No. 431, ยง 8;Laws 2025, LB357, ยง 22.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
